seo.title: Boost Productivity with Link Management Tools
seo.description: Work faster with a structured link workflow across teams.

content_markdown:
# Maximize Productivity with Link Management

Managing links efficiently saves hours each week. In this guide, you'll learn:

- How to create a simple taxonomy for links
- Ways to automate routine tasks
- Dashboards that surface the right links at the right time

## 1. Create a taxonomy
Use tags like `campaign`, `channel`, `persona` to make links discoverable.

## 2. Automate routine tasks
Auto-tag links based on source and add UTM consistently.

## 3. Build the right dashboards
Use charts to see performance by channel, device, and geo.

> Tip: Start small. Standardize a few tags first, then evolve.

seo.description: Spaces, permissions, and naming that scale with your org.

content_markdown:
# Organizing Links for Teams

When teams grow, link chaos grows faster. Here's how to stay ahead.

## Spaces and permissions
Keep sensitive links isolated with role-based access.

## Naming conventions
Adopt `<team>-<topic>-<purpose>` to stay consistent.

## Reviews
Run a monthly cleanup to archive stale links.
